snippet: Cursive writing is looping back into style in schools across the country after a generation of students who know only keyboarding, texting and printing out their words longhand....

headline.main: Czar Bust in Crimea Reportedly Appears to Shed Tears
headline.print_headline: Czar Bust in Crimea Reportedly Appears to Shed Tears

lead_paragraph: Cursive writing is looping back into style in schools across the country after a generation of students who know only keyboarding, texting and printing out their words longhand.
